title: New client causing a lot of headaches for me, any help would be appreciated!
body:
One day I was playing league and it crashed. When it crashed, It would not let me get on the game anymore. League of Legends client will pop up, but when I push the play button to get into login screen, it just goes away. I have tried repairing it at the first screen. I have also tried uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times. I don't understand why the old client worked and the new one does not!

Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: It almost sounds like your OS might be blocking League from launching correctly. Essentially, your pc has to give programs permission to run, and without that permission, it might think League isn't safe. Check out the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be good to go, but hit me back if you still can't get back on the Rift!
